import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { NumberFormat } from '../screens/NumberFormat'; function Product({product}) { return ( {product.name}
{NumberFormat(product.price)} ) } export default Product
